text: André Marcel Berthelot (20 May 1862 – 6 June 1938) was the son of the chemist and politician Marcellin Berthelot and a député of the Seine. He was secretary-general of the Grande Encyclopédie starting with the fourth volume. He was also a banker, a professor in ancient history, a vice-president of the École des hautes études and a member of the École de Rome. == External links == * Notice biographique sur www.senat.fr * Notice biographique sur www.assemblee-nationale.fr Category:1862 births Category:1938 deaths Category:Politicians from Paris Category:Lycée Henri-IV alumni Category:École pratique des hautes études faculty Category:Senators of Seine (department)
